allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Use proxy pool selection in source proxy settings

Backend implementation:
- Add ProxyMode enum (none/pool/manual) to AdminSource model
- Add proxy_mode, proxy_id, proxy_enabled fields to admin_sources table
- Create GET /api/v1/admin/proxies/options endpoint for proxy selection
- Update source CRUD endpoints to return proxy_pool_summary
- Handle proxy_mode logic in update_source (clear manual fields for pool mode)
- Update data engine scraping to respect source.proxy_mode
- Add database migration 0020_source_proxy_mode.py

Features:
- Sources can now use proxy pool, manual proxy, or no proxy
- Pool mode shows summary (enabled count, weight sum, last exit IP)
- Automatic cleanup of manual proxy settings when switching to pool
- Warning logged if pool mode selected but DATA_ENGINE_USE_PROXY_POOL flag off
- Backward compatibility with existing settings_json proxy config
EOF
)")
